desc: The Brick Shack is a family-owned business that sells collections of new, retired and hard to find LEGO® products. Find your LEGO Sets, Pre-owned sets, Minifigures, Polybags, Parts and more. Shop now online or in store!

layout.text: LEGO® inspired store in Grimsby, Ontario
WE ARE OPEN FOR IN-STORE SHOPPING ONLY!!
